client.model

Class TradeOffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.model.TradeOffer

  • public class TradeOffer
extends java.lang.Object
    The TradeOffer class will be used in trades between players and the bank.
    Domain: 1 sender, 1 receiver, 0-95 resources to be traded
    Author:
    Chad

      • getOffer

        public Resources getOffer()
        Getter for the specified resources of the trade
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        Returns a Resource class that contains amounts of each of the resources to be traded. Positive numbers for the receiver and negative numbers for the sender
